Package business

Class CharacterManager

java.lang.Object
business.CharacterManager
public class CharacterManager extends Object
Class that focuses on logic related to characters and connects the business layer to lower ones, specifically the persistence layer.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CharacterManager(DataMenuOptions choice)
    Default constructor, which uses either the JSON Data Access Object for characters with a fixed file or the API Data Access Object for characters.

  • Constructor Details

    • CharacterManager

      public CharacterManager(DataMenuOptions choice) throws PersistenceException, IOException
      Default constructor, which uses either the JSON Data Access Object for characters with a fixed file or the API Data Access Object for characters.
      Parameters:
      choice - whether the user wants to access the game in local or cloud.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - if the manager can't be instantiated because of errors in the persistence layer
      IOException - if the manager can't be instantiated because of errors in the persistence layer

  • Method Details

    • correctName

      public boolean correctName(String provisionalName)
      Method that checks whether the name has any special characters.
      Parameters:
      provisionalName - a string representation of the queried character's name
      Returns:
      a boolean that indicates whether it is correct or not.

    • correctCasing

      public String correctCasing(String provisionalName)
      Method that gets a name and makes it so that it has the correct casing.
      Parameters:
      provisionalName - a string representation of the queried character's name
      Returns:
      a string representation of a character's name with the correct casing.

    • checkUniqueName

      public boolean checkUniqueName(String name)
      Method that checks whether the name that was input by the user already exists.
      Parameters:
      name - a string representation of the queried character's name
      Returns:
      whether the name is already in use or not

    • addNewCharacter

      public boolean addNewCharacter(String name, String player, int level, int[] stats, String class_)
      Method that adds a character to the system.
      Parameters:
      name - a string representation of the character's name
      player - a string representation of the character's creator
      level - an int representation of the character's level which is turned to xp
      stats - an array of int that represents the character's statistics
      class_ - a string representation of the character's class
      Returns:
      whether the student was successfully created or not

    • findCharacterByPlayerName

      public ArrayList<Character> findCharacterByPlayerName(String playerName)
      Method that searches existing characters for those owned by a given player name.
      Parameters:
      playerName - a string representation of the name of the player whose characters we need to look for
      Returns:
      an array list containing object representations of all characters owned by the given player

    • extractNamesFromCharacters

      public String[] extractNamesFromCharacters(ArrayList<Character> characters)
      Method that extracts the names of a list of characters.
      Parameters:
      characters - an array list representation of characters.
      Returns:
      an array containing string representations of all characters' names.

    • checkChoiceValid

      public boolean checkChoiceValid(int num, int choice)
      Method that checks whether the character choice by the user is within the bounds of the list
      Parameters:
      num - an int representation of the length of the list
      choice - an int representation of the choice made by the user
      Returns:
      a boolean representation of whether the choice made by the user is correct or not.

    • decisionEqualsName

      public boolean decisionEqualsName(String decision, Character character)
      Method that checks whether the input of the user matches the name of the character
      Parameters:
      decision - a String representation of the input of the user
      character - an object representation of the character whose existence is put into debate
      Returns:
      a boolean representation of whether the input of the user matches the name of the character or not.

      public boolean removeCharacter(Character character)
      Method that deletes a character from the system.
      Parameters:
      character - an object representation of the character to remove
      Returns:
      whether the character was successfully deleted or not

      Returns:
      an int representation of the equivalent experience

      Returns:

      public int shortRestActions(Character character, boolean levelUp, ArrayList<Character> characters)
      Method that generates the short rest stage actions after the encounter
      Parameters:
      character - the character involved in the encounter
      levelUp - whether the character leveled up or not
      characters - the list of characters in the party
      Returns:
      int representation of the amount of health the character has recovered

      public void reverseSupportActions(Character character, ArrayList<Character> characters)

      Parameters:
      character - the character involved in the encounter
      characters - the list of characters in the party
